txt.en: 'I have a favour to ask of you, [placeholder]. The Wargs of the Wolf-denes have long been a thorn in the side of the people in the Vales. They are a great enemy of my kin. I have watched most of the warg host move south, but a small pack of them remains to reinforce their allies, the goblins in the Misty Mountains.\n\n'I cannot leave my post to deal with them myself, but they are a plague upon travellers. Please, will you go and clear them out?'

'Would you be willing to help me with something, child? One of our great enemies, the Wargs of the Wolf-denes, have long been a thorn in the side of our kinfolk. Most of their host has moved south, but a small pack of them remains to reinforce the goblins in the Misty Mountains.\n\n'I cannot leave my post to deal with them myself, but they are a plague upon travellers. Please, will you go and clear them out?'
Hertha, Keeper of the Pass, has asked you to clear out a pack of wargs that plague the road into the Beorning-lands.
Hertha can be found along the road to the High Pass in the Wolf-denes.\n\nYou should talk to Hertha.
'Excellent work, [placeholder]. I could see your fighting skills from here! You are a true ally of the Beornings.'
'Excellent work, [placeholder]. I could see your fighting skills from here! I will tell Grimbeorn of your valour when next I see him.'
The Warg Clearing can be found north-west of Vegbár.\n\nYou should defeat the wargs and their leader.
